title: The Tar-Aiym Krang
description: Flinx, his psychic ability enhanced by pet mini-dragon Pip, finds a map to an artifact, the Krang, left by the Tar Aiym alien race. Human Bran Tse-Mallory and insectoid manx Truzenzuzex also enlist rich Malaika, bodyguard Wolf, starship pilot Atha, and concubine Sissiph. But evil Rashalleila wants the weapon - who has a mind of its own.
author: Alan Dean Foster
